title: Keep your data on your phone
description: The data entered in the app is stored locally on your device, not on any servers.

title: See your data
description: See insights about your data, including visualizations

title: Available in different languages
description: Trackrrr is available in English, French, Spanish, Swedish, and Arabic, with more languages on the way.

title: Dark and Light modes
description: Use the app in your preferred appearance mode.

title: Customizable notifications
description: Get notified for your upcoming period so that you can prepare accordingly. Configure push notifications to receive only the ones you care about. Customize text for more discrete (or fun!) notifications.

title: Import and Export your data
description: Import or export your period tracking data as CSV.
